mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE(latitude, longitude, zip, address, name, detail, telephone, img_url) VALUES ( #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{zip}, #{address}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{telephone}, #{imgUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, latitude, longitude, zip, address, name, detail, telephone, img_url AS imgURL FROM STORE ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
